item.description:
Enjoy an evening of socializing and relaxing in the stylish and sophisticated Violet Thorn Lounge located in the newly renovated chic and hip Verve/Crowne Plaza Hotel in Natick. The hotel's theme is 20th century American Pop Culture. Be sure to check out the large lobby filled with eye-catching & interactive memorabilia and art while there.  Don't miss this fun afterwork cocktail party!


The Violet Thorn is the winner of The 2012 Taste of Metrowest "BEST COCKTAILS AND APPETIZERS" Award. It is located 15 miles west of Boston, off the Mass Pike on Rt. 9, across the street from the Natick Collection and Shoppers World.

 

Read more about the newly renovated Verve/ Crown Plaza Natick hotel here:

http://travelandleisurenews.com/news/crowne-plaza-natick/verve-crowne-plaza.htm
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess when you arrive.
item.name: Afterwork Cocktail Party at the Violet Thorn Lounge!
